page.title: 07Inside a House
page.content: My house is semi-detached. It has three windows and a door both at the back and the front. The front door opens into a hall where the stairs and doors for the living room and kitchen are. In the living room there is a wall unit for books and ornaments, a settee, a coffee table and a sterio record and cassette player. In the kitchen there are many cupboards, a table and chairs, a cooker, a freezer and a washing machine. Upstairs there are three bedrooms and a bathroom. In my bedroom I have a large bed, a wardrobe, two sets of drawers, a chair and a cupboard for my books and toys.
